thread.title: Was Grayson Allen the victim of a REVENGE TRIP by Florida State’s Xavier Rathan-Mayes?
thread.title_full: Was Grayson Allen the victim of a REVENGE TRIP by Florida State’s Xavier Rathan-Mayes?

author: Ricky O'Donnell
title: Was Grayson Allen the victim of a REVENGE TRIP by Florida State’s Xavier Rathan-Mayes?
text:
OK, this looks unintentional, but still. 
So, Grayson Allen fake-tripped himself. Good catch by ESPN. #Duke pic.twitter.com/ziEvlr7su2 
— Daniel Beyer (@danbeyeronfox) March 1, 2017 Grayson Allen’s unfortunate habit of tripping opponents began last season when he tripped Florida State’s Xavier Rathan-Mayes . It’s been the biggest storyline in college basketball ever since.
On Tuesday, Rathan-Mayes appeared to trip Allen during the second half of Florida State’s game with Duke. It looked unintentional, but we wouldn’t be doing our job if we didn’t alert you to this momentous occasion. 
You decide: is this a legit trip, or nah?
